name: Sky Doodlez
description:
Sky Doodlez is a single player, action / arcade game. Play as a stunt plane at an air show and draw fun images with your smoke trail before your fuel runs out! Connect the targets and loop around the hot air balloons to draw your images, but make sure to follow the correct order!

Controls:

[A] or [<-] to turn upwards
[D] or [->] to turn downwards
[SPACEBAR] to cut engine

Targets:

Fly through these!

Blue: Passed targets
Green: Next target
Orange: Next next target
Red: Do not go 

Hot Air Balloon Loops:

Loop around these!

By Team Take Off!

Nicolas Tetreault
Lina Jaouani
Kyle Dimaano
Kristine Hipolito
